title: Nice horror thriller
review: Nice horror thriller. However it follows this linear line that only goes in the direction of the movie, in order for the next step to happen... Obviously, any real kid would run away at the first sight of the clown!

title: In 1 word... Orgasmic
review:
An incredible duel between a drummer student and a bandmaster teacher.
Exciting, passionating, orgasmic !

title: Entertaining alien-like movie
review:
A good entertainment about alien life...
It's exciting, true. But nothing new...

title: In few words...
review: Baseline: a young scum/riffraff becomes a secret agent...Great action movie, violent but yet hilarious. Original, and new faces on screen make it a very nice movie.
